author: Grant Wheeler
description: A very different "Lady" to the White Lady, this is a riff on a Naked & Famous with falernum in place of Yellow Chartreuse. If using a full-flavoured falernum (such as our own Difford's Falernum) then you may not want/need the additional spice added by using chili bitters.
name: Spicy Dead Lady

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
